## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATHB-4, ATHB4, HB4</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA HOMEOBOX-LEUCINE ZIPPER PROTEIN 4, homeobox-leucine zipper protein 4, homeobox-leucine zipper protein 4
- **Description:**   homeobox-leucine zipper protein 4;(source:Araport11)

- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
